name: 8oz Rubber Mallet Hammer, Fiberglass Handle, Rubber Mallet for Flooring, Tent Stakes, Woodworking, Camping, Soft Blow Tasks without Damage

Premium Materials: Rubber mallet head is made of rubber, making it durable and able to withstand heavy use.

Fiberglass Shock Absorbing Handle: PP+TPR handle can reduce vibration and damage to the arm, allowing for greater control during work.

name: 2-Piece Rubber Mallet Hammer Set-16 oz. White and Black Rubber Mallet and 35 mm Dual Nylon Head Installation Hammer, Soft Grip Fiberglass Handle, Double-faced Non-marring and Solid Head
short_description: WOTAHI Rubber Mallet Hammer Set includes 1 pc 16 oz white and black rubber mallet and 1 pc 35 mm double nylon head installation hammer

WOTAHI Hammer Set has 2 different hammer heads, double-sided, non-marking white and black solid rubber head, non-marring solid nylon head, both heads delivers softened positive strike, you can strike safely without damaging sensitive finishes or surfaces

WOTAHI Mallet Hammer handle made of high-strength,lightweight fiberglass to naturally dampen stinging vibrations, and the virtually unbreakable handle core features soft, non-slip rubber sleeve to prevent slipping and absorb impact for ultimate comfort

The mallet head and handle adopt reliable embedding technology to firmly connect mallet head and handle to prevent loosening or falling off, ensuring that the head will not break or the handle will fall off, ensuring safety and extending the service life

Essential Tools for Your Toolbox: WOTAHI Mallet Hammer Set comes in 2 different styles to meet your basic needs, allowing you to safely work with construction, furniture, metal, automotive, tire, flooring, leather work

name: Estwing DH-18N 18 Oz No-Mar Deadhead Rubber Mallet, Wood Handle , Gray
short_description: FEATURES DEADHEAD TECHNOLOGY - Designed to reduces bounce back and enhance your control for every strike, unlike other rubber hammers.
PROTECT YOUR SURFACES - Premium rubber head helps to eliminate damage to your striking surface.
MULTI-USE MALLET - Versatility at its finest and perfect for sheet metal forming, upholstery, automotive, furniture assembly, tile setting, flooring installs, & even a great camping hammer.
GENUINE HICKORY HANDLE – Creating a lightweight feel that fits the grip of the user’s hand, ensuring comfort & control.
THE FINEST STRIKING TOOLS SINCE 1923 - With durability, functionality and longevity at its core, Estwing has been and engineering the world's most trusted striking tools since for nearly 100 years
product_description: Estwing's 18 oz. Deadhead Rubber Mallet comes with a hickory (Carya) handle to create an all-around, premium quality tool. The hickory handle is extremely durable and shock resistant, while the non-marring rubber head offers sturdy control, accurate strikes and great results. This rubber mallet is also bounce resistant and features a 2.5 in. face diameter with a head length of 4-1/2 in., the perfect tool for safely smoothing while protecting your finishing surfaces.

short_description: Essential Tool for Toolbox: Dual-sided rubber hammer features interchangeable soft and hard tips to ensure protection while working on surfaces and it will not damage your metal and wood works. Compact & Lightweight Design: The soft hammer in this set is compact for easy storage and transport while still delivering a firm yet gentle strike. A great addition to any toolbox for tasks requiring a small rubber mallet hammer or larger, heavy-duty applications.
